amendment.description: Amendment sought to state that none of the funds may be used for NOAA to utilize a North Atlantic right whale Risk Reduction Decision Support Tool.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to state that none of the funds may be used for NOAA to utilize a North Atlantic right whale Risk Reduction Decision Support Tool.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 345 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 345 (Roll no. 372).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Golden.
